{{BLP IMDB refimprove|date=January 2010}} {{Infobox person | name = Billy Unger | image = | caption = | birthname = William Brent Unger | birth_date = {{birth date and age |1995|10|15}} | birth_place = [[Palm Beach County, Florida|Palm Beach County]], [[Florida]], [[United States]] | occupation = Actor, Voice actor, Model | yearsactive = 2007âpresent | website = http://billy-unger.com }} '''William Brent''' "'''Billy'''" '''Unger''' (born October 15, 1995) is an [[United States|American]] [[child actor|teen actor]] credited as '''Billy Unger'''. Unger as a child actor appeared in high-attention films such as ''[[National Treasure: Book of Secrets]]'' (2007), ''[[imdbtitle:1209380|Cop Dog]]'' (2008), ''[[Opposite Day]]'' (2009), ''[[You Again]]'' (2010) and will appear as the title character ''Billy Stone'' in ''[[imdbtitle:1390539|The Lost Medallion: The Adventures of Billy Stone]]'' (2011) alongside young actress [[Sammi Hanratty]]. ==Filmography== ===Films=== {| class=wikitable |- !
